channel.title: When Is It Enough?
channel.description:
[img]http://sc-cdn.scaleengine.net/i/8028517567f524d1a9eb0d86dce0ec82.png[/img]
Great. Now I can download PuP's, watch advertisement videos, and fill out survey's to earn coins toward cosmetic items.

item.title: When Is It Enough?
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:7, topic:546040”][quote author=Death Style link=topic=664931.msg4445087#msg4445087 date=1408329356]
this is kind of old
[/quote][/quote]
omg thanks for telling me I had no idea

Read full topic

item.title: When Is It Enough?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:4, topic:546040”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=664931.msg4445078#msg4445078 date=1408326299]
Now everyone hound him like you did me because he’s a few months late.

Lol these offers are total shit. I used bluestacks to do a bunch of android ones and they didn’t complete, and I reported it to the stupid company in charge of the rewards crap and they didn’t give me my coins. Dicks.
[/quote]
Lol, shouldn’t be late unless there’s already a thread about it.

I’ve seen this bs software before in other applications, it’s so faulty it’s unbelievable.[/quote]
Same here. I believe the same company that does the offers for RuneScape is the same one that does it for Kongregate (popular game website sponsored/owned by GameStop). Had the same issues too, but on Kong they didn’t care to check my reports and just gave me the credits.

Read full topic
